item.description:
From 5:30 - 8 pm each month, First Friday features live jazz music performed by local and nationally-known musicians, an opportunity to view the Museum's premier permanent collection of 300 yrs of American art, a chance to mix and mingle, a selection of lite hors d'oeuvres, and wine, beer, and soda.

The cost is $7 for Museum members and $12 for non-members and includes 2 drink tickets with a cash bar thereafter.

On this nite, the Brian Jenkins Trio performs. Brian is a graduate of UHart's Hartt School of Music. The jazz trio highlites the best of the music of Oscar Peterson, Red Garland and Wynton Kelly.

The stage is set for an enjoyable evening of music, art, and conversation.

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: First Friday- Art, Wine, Live Jazz
